src_original: tat karasya samyagduḥkhakṣayāya tāḥ pratisevamāṇo na niryāyāt samyagduḥkhakṣayāya,  yāvad imāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni.
tgt_original: 四、具足修行證於出離無畏。

src_original: (20) katame ca subhūte [f. 280b] tathāgatasya aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ? (i)

tgt_original: 二、無卒暴音； 三、無忘失念； 四、無不定心；

src_original: nāsti cchandasya hāniḥ, (viii)  nāsti vīryasya hāniḥ, (ix)
tgt_original: 七、欲無減； 八、精進無減；

src_original: atīte 'dhvany apratihatam asaṅgaṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate. (xvii)  anāgate 'dhvany apratihatam asaṅgaṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate. (xviii)
tgt_original: 十三、於過去世智見無著、無礙； 十四、於未來世智見無著、無礙；

src_original: pratyutpanne 'dhvany apratihatam asaṅgaṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate. ime 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ.
tgt_original: 十五、於現在世智見無著、無礙；
